title: E174 A Diamond in the Wall and Untarnished Vibes
description:
We're going full rhombus this week, everyone! We've got some life announcements and some wild stories as Em takes us back into the world of Harry Prices with the story of the Séance of Rosalie. Then Christine covers the intense and gruesome story of Michelle Knotek. It only gets worse from here... and that's why we drink!


Please consider supporting the companies that support us!


Use coupon code DRINK for $10 off your first box at fabfitfun.com!


Visit Audible.com/drink or text drink to 500-500
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
